mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Miley, Michael, 1841-1918
mdRecord.dcterms:description: These pictures are portraits of Chas Boogher. In Pose 1, he is wearing a plain, dark suit. In Pose 2, he is wearing a striped suit with a Shriner's hat. These prints were made from the original glass plate negatives, which are housed at Virginia Historical Society.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Portraits of Chas Boogher (photographs)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Portrait photography
Virginia -- Rockbridge County
Twentieth century
